content: Is there any way for us to tell which commit chat.zulip.org is currently pointed at?
I'm pretty sure it's 152da7 based on Tim's deploy message in #announce and the committer times (shows when Tim merged it in)

@Sean Wallitsch not super easily; it's the timabbott/master branch in my GitHub fork, which is sorta a silly place. Usually has a few commits not in master (e.g. the PM pills, right now) that we're testing out before merging.
